aboutInfo2: After years of working in education, my desire to grow and feel professionally fulfilled led me to get into programming. What attracted me the most to this world? The fact of being able to
aboutInfoSpan: working in a team and cooperatively, the novelty of the day to day, the challenges and above all the possibility of working in multidisciplinary environments.
aboutInfoSpan2: to continue my training and improve my skills
aboutInfo4: learning from my colleagues so that in the future I can be the one to teach others.
aboutDescription: Web Developer. Maintenance and development of various projects in the field of circular economy with a team of expert developers in different sectors.
aboutDescription2: Pool 42 (selected). 26 consecutive days of work governed by the 42 methodology. Daily projects focused on obtaining a solid base in C language through peer to peer and self-learning.
aboutDescription3: Web Programming Bootcamp oriented to the development of web/mobile pages using programming languages such as HTML, CSS3 or JavaScript along with other programming tools.
projectsDescription: Template of a simple landing page suitable for editing and developing future projects. Built from scratch with HTML5, Typescript, Angular and Sass. Additionally, it uses Jasmine and Karma for unit and integration testing.
projectsDescription2: Interactive website designed to generate personalized business cards. Created from a proposal given by Adalab with HTML5, JavaScript and Sass. Collaborative project.
projectsDescription3: Web designed to consult technical information of a specific country. Created from a design given by Fernando Herrera (Udemy) with Angular and Bootstrap.
projectsDescription4: Web designed to consult technical information about the types of Pipes that exist in Angular. Created from a design given by Fernando Herrera (Udemy) with Angular and Bootstrap.
